title: Typeface for a game engine/IDE
content:
Hi folks,

I'm revamping the brand/site for [www.spritebuilder.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417154904/http:/www.spritebuilder.com/ "www.spritebuilder.com"), which is a tool game developers can use to build games (using Objective-C, for iOS and Android).

The playful feel of the brand is basically correct, but we'd like it to be a touch more professional-looking, and the logotype in particular needs work.

Suggestions of contemporary-looking sans faces with a smidge of playfulness about them (not too much; the colors and mascot go a long way) would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!
author: Zach

comments.content:
Since the project is open source, I think that using an open source font would be fitting.  
In this regard, I’m partial to Pablo Impallari’s work, which offers a few contemporary yet somewhat playful sans:  
 [http://www.impallari.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417154904/http:/www.impallari.com/ "http://www.impallari.com/")
